The Miles Mikolas story isn't talked about enough. 

- came up with SDP as a reliever in 2012. 
- released by TEX in 2014 after posting a 6.44 ERA.
- pitched in the KBO from 2015 - 2017.
- signed by STL in 2018
- now in 2022, he's a 2x all-star with a 3.32 ERA since coming back.
